levelList.name: Kaybol...
levelList.desc:

- Prioritizes <Bloodfiend> allies
- If the affected ally is a <Bloodfiend>, this unit applies 1 additional [BloomingThornsRodionFirst]
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 5 [Laceration]

If target has 6+ [Sinking], Coin Power +1
<style="highlight">Clash Power +1 for euygulary 2 [ProtectiveSword] (maks 2)</style>
[WhenUse] At 15+ [BlackTearsAlly], consume 5 [BlackTearsAlly] to deal +15% damage

levelList.name: Arcana Pierce
levelList.desc:
If target has 6+ [Sinking], Coin Power +1
Clash Power +1 for euygulary 2 [ProtectiveSword] (maks 2)
[WhenUse] At 10+ [BlackTearsAlly], consume up to 20 [BlackTearsAlly]
- Deal +(Stack consumed x 1.5)% damage
[EndSkill] If target is defeated, regain half of [BlackTearsAlly] consumed by this Skill

levelList.name: Arcana Pierce
levelList.desc:
If target has 6+ [Sinking], Coin Power +1
Clash Power +1 for <style="highlight">euygulary</style> [ProtectiveSword] (maks <style="highlight">5</style>)
[WhenUse] At 10+ [BlackTearsAlly], consume up to 20 [BlackTearsAlly]
- Deal +(Stack consumed x 1.5)% damage
<style="highlight">- Base Power +1 for euygulary 5 Stack consumed</style>
[EndSkill] If target is defeated, regain half of [BlackTearsAlly] consumed by this Skill

coindescs.desc: <style="highlight">If this unit has [SwordCutwithTear], or consumed it with this Coin, deal +20% damage</style>

levelList.name: The Knight's Faith
levelList.desc:
[CanDuelGuard]
[StartBattle] Gain Shield equal to (SP / 5)% of this unit's max HP (tur başına bir kere)
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [BlackTearsAlly] (2 times per turn)
[EndBattle] At less than 3 [SwordCutwithTear], lose 15 SP and gain 1 [SwordCutwithTear] (tur başına bir kere)
- If this unit has [SwordCutwithTear], lose ([SwordCutwithTear] Stack x 15) more SP

levelList.name: The Knight's Faith
levelList.desc:

[StartBattle] Gain Shield equal to (SP / <style="highlight">3</style>)% of this unit's max HP (tur başına bir kere)
[WhenUse] Gain <style="highlight">5</style> [BlackTearsAlly] (2 times per turn)
[EndBattle] At less than 3 [SwordCutwithTear], lose 15 SP to gain 1 [SwordCutwithTear] (tur başına bir kere)
- If this unit has [SwordCutwithTear], lose ([SwordCutwithTear] Stack x 15) more SP

levelList.name: Arcana: Tear and Pierce
levelList.desc:
Final Power +1 for euygulary 3 [Sinking] on target (maks 2)
[WhenUse] Lose 15 SP

- Deal +(Stack consumed x 3)% damage
[EndSkill] If target is defeated, regain half of [BlackTearsAlly] consumed by this Skill
